extendedInfo.description: Automatically switches on GPS (rooted devices) and WiFi (all ) devices when you launch any of the following applications:- Maps- Navigation- Local- Latitude- Waze- My Tracks- Nike+ Running- RunKeeper* Please do not give a 1 star rating if GPS does not get enabled on a non-rooted device. *WiFi gets enabled on all Android versions (no root required).GPS gets enabled without requiring root Android versions < 2.3.3 and with *root* on newer versions (e.g. Jelly Bean). This is a restriction by Google/Android. Even if GPS does not get not automatically enabled (or you have already kept it enabled by default), WiFi is very useful (and often sufficient) to accurately locate the device, especially in city areas.GPS and WiFi are also restored to their old values when you quit these applications (or move to another application or the Home Screen). e.g. If GPS was disabled before you launched Maps, it will be automatically disabled when you quit Maps.*** Important *** Please launch the application once, after it is installed, to enable its functionality. You do *not* need to launch it after subsequent reboots.GPS and WiFi help Maps, Navigation, etc. in quickly finding your location, but leaving them switched on all the time drains your device's battery.* Works for all Android versions (including Donut, Eclair, Froyo, Gingerbread, Honeycomb, Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Bean).* Does not drain your device's battery.Please let us know your suggestions for improving the application by sending us an email.

reviews.title: absolutely wonderful
reviews.comment: Much easier to navigate somewhere quickly. Very hassle free.
reviews.author: juan juarez

reviews.title: Didn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Only enabled wifi not gps on my gs4
reviews.author: Hans Aramburo

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Only switches on wifi not gps. Useless app. I am rooted so rating is fair. Truly gutted nothing else like this exists.
reviews.author: M Kaa

reviews.title: Does what it says!
reviews.comment: Saves battery life too, since I don\'t need to keep wifi and GPS enabled all the time.
reviews.author: Abni Use

reviews.title: It would be nice if possible to add more apps.
reviews.comment: Hi!  It would be nice if we could add more apps (like waze etc.) to this trigger.  Thanks,  Yossi
reviews.author: Yossi Goltz

reviews.comment: Sorry,  Doesn\'t work on N4 with latest version of Jelly Bean
reviews.author: Scott Gillan

reviews.title: Galaxy S4 is a no-go
reviews.comment: The app only turns wifi on.
reviews.author: Dustin Olenslager
